quiz.title: Homomyms , exercise 3
quiz.instruction: Fill in the blank with the correct option

mcq_text.task: There were ______ many people at the park.
mcq_text.negative_feedback:
There were too many people at the park.
Too - in excess, in addition or also
Two - the number two (2)
To - expressing motion or relating to an object

mcq_text.task: Can you see the restaurant over ______ ?
mcq_text.negative_feedback:
Can you see the restaurant over there?
Their - belonging to them
There - location
They're - contraction of "they are"

mcq_text.task: The shelves in the store were _______.
mcq_text.negative_feedback:
The shelves in the store were bare.
Bear - the animal
Bare - simple, without

mcq_text.task: Let's get a _______ pizza to share.
mcq_text.negative_feedback:
Let's get a whole pizza to share.
Whole - all of or an entire object
Hole - an opening

mcq_text.task: The kids like to ______ down the hill.
mcq_text.negative_feedback:
The kids like to roll down the hill.
Roll - in a ball
Role - part in a play

The dog is wagging his tail.
Tail - end, or animal tail
Tale - story told
